alert.note: Alert for Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 06 at 1:09PM MST until February 08 at 3:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM TUESDAY TO 3 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts up to 85 mph expected. For the second High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...The foothills and plains adjacent to the Rocky Mountain Front, and Southern Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...For the first High Wind Warning, until 10 AM MST Tuesday. For the second High Wind Warning, from 9 PM Tuesday to 3 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
